name: com.unity.mobile.notifications
description:
Mobile Notifications package adds support for scheduling local repeatable or one-time notifications on iOS and Android.

On iOS receiving of push notifications is also supported.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixes:
- [Android] - Mark Android library to be compatible only with Android.
- [iOS] - Calendar trigger will use local or UTC time depending on which one is set on trigger.
- Various documentation fixes.
